column4: Design patent case against Tesla holds no truck with experts
column5: Electric auto maker Tesla Inc has a strong defense in a lawsuit brought by rival Nikola Corp alleging infringement of patents on semi truck designs  intellectual property lawyers said.

column4: U.S. safety agency says 'did not assess' Tesla Autopilot effectiveness
column5: WASHINGTON A U.S. traffic safety regulator on Wednesday contradicted Tesla Inc's claim that the agency had found that its Autopilot technology significantly reduced crashes  saying that regulators "did not assess" the system's effectiveness in a 2017 report.

column4: UPDATE 1-U.S. safety agency says 'did not assess' Tesla Autopilot effectiveness
column5: WASHINGTON  May 2 A U.S. traffic safety regulator on Wednesday contradicted Tesla Inc's claim that the agency had found that its Autopilot technology significantly reduced crashes  saying that regulators "did not assess" the system's effectiveness in a 2017 report.

column4: Breakingviews - Tesla speeding toward capital raise crunch time
column5: NEW YORK (Reuters Breakingviews) - Tesla is speeding toward capital-raise crunch time. The electric-car maker on Wednesday reported a loss of $710 million in the first three months of the year. It also experienced a slew of other problems  including annoying a regulator after disclosing information about a fatal crash and losing more key staff.

column4: BRIEF-Tesla Reports Q1 GAAP Net Loss Of $4.19 Per Share
column5: * QUARTERLY TOTAL REVENUE $3.41 BILLION VERSUS $2.70 BILLION REPORTED LAST YEAR

column4: U.S. safety agency: prior probe did not assess 'effectiveness' of Tesla Autopilot
column5: WASHINGTON  May 2 The U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety said Wednesday that a prior investigation into Tesla Inc's semi-autonomous "Autopilot" self-driving system did not assess the "effectiveness" of the technology.

column4: Tesla Model 3 production target on track
column5: May 2 Tesla Inc on Wednesday said its Model 3 production target remains on track  expecting about 5 000 per week in about two months.

column4: Nikola Motor sues Tesla alleging design patent violation
column5: Nikola Motor Co  which makes hydrogen-powered semi trucks  filed a lawsuit on Tuesday against electric automaker Tesla Inc  alleging design patent infringements.

column4: Nikola Motor sues Tesla alleging design patent violation
column5: May 2 Nikola Motor Co  which makes hydrogen-powered semi trucks  filed a lawsuit on Tuesday against electric automaker Tesla Inc alleging design patent infringements.

column4: U.S. tech  banks are big winners from lower taxes in first quarter
column5: SAN FRANCISCO U.S. technology heavyweights like Apple  Amazon and Intel along with Wall Street's biggest banks look like the early winners from Republicans' corporate tax cuts  boosting their bottom lines by more than $11 billion so far  a Reuters analysis of first-quarter earnings showed.
